paper_abstract: A partial difference set in a finite group such that and corresponds to an undirected strongly regular Cayley graph Very few examples of PDSs are known, and there are especially few known in nonabelian groups. In this paper, a partial difference set with and is constructed for each extraspecial group of order and exponent , where is an odd prime.
paper_title: A construction of a partial difference set in the extraspecial groups of order p(3) with exponent p(2)
